text: Blake Slatkin (born October 16, 1997) is an American record producer and songwriter. He produced songs for many singers such as Justin Bieber, Lil Nas X, Lizzo, The Kid Laroi, Sam Smith, and SZA. Slatkin has produced seven Billboard Hot 100-top ten singles, four of which reached number one. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:American record producers Category:American songwriters Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles
title: Blake Slatkin
